page.name: A5.u.element.show
page.description: Show an element with animation. Will fallback gracefully to plain show if jQuery is not available.

argument.name: animationSetting
argument.description: A JSON object of animation settings. The settings you can define are listed below:

item.name: type
item.description: Animation type. Can be one of the following properties: *[js:'none']*, *[js:'fade']*, *[js:'slide']*, *[js:'blind']*, *[js:'clip']*, *[js:'drop']*, *[js:'explode']*, *[js:'fold']*, *[js:'puff']*, *[js:'scale']*, *[js:'size']*, or *[js:'pulsate']*.

item.name: duration
item.description: The duration of the animation in milliseconds.

item.name: onComplete
item.description: Function to call when the animation is complete. Can be inlined. Eg, Eg, *[js:onComplete: function(){};]*
